This can help you get a sense of their knowledge and expertise. 4. A provider who has undergone specialized training in these areas may be more knowledgeable. 5. Discuss treatment options: Ask the provider about their approach to hormone therapy and supplements, and discuss different treatment options. A provider who is open to different approaches and willing to collaborate with you in developing a customized treatment plan may be a good fit. Remember that finding a healthcare provider who is knowledgeable about hormone therapy and supplements can take time and patience, but it's important to find someone who you feel comfortable working with and who understands your unique needs and concerns.
